title: About Me
i_am: I am a graduated composer, I work in the field of music production and sound design.

1.description: I am a member of the Uklad Formalny theatre, I compose for theater, films, computer games, commercials.
1.content_l:

1.description: Every day in the Polish Radio Channel Two, you can hear my jingle (in the „Fantazja Polska” broadcast).

2.description: Last time at a game jam I did a game about pickles.

3.description: After graduation I have broadened my audio skills and knowledge in the Ballroom Studios.

4.description:
I totally suck at Mario Bros.
(I don’t know why, but I can’t deal even with the first level).
